summary: Page 32 (book page 52/nun-bet). Covers continuation of section 125, then sections 126-132. All section numbers match correctly. Sections cover tzedakah/gemilut chasadim topics. Section 132 title appears but makor text begins on next page.

issues.description: Section 132 has an empty paragraphs array []. The section header and title appear on this page but the makor text (which begins with 'מקור המצוה: ישלם ה' פעלך...') starts on the next page. The makor paragraph should have been included from the next page's continuation, or at minimum this should have been noted. The continues_to meta correctly flags this.
issues.corrected_text: paragraphs should contain at least the beginning of the makor from the visible text
